task.title: Task: Finding Data Sources
task.shortdesc: A PivotTable contains summarized data. In this task, you learn how to find the source of these data.

context.p: In a worksheet are some data of employees like sales, expenses, and provision per month and per region. A PivotTable with the sales per region per employee has been created in another worksheet.

If you want the individual values a result is provided, Excel can show you this quickly and easily. By double-clicking on a result, Excel creates a new worksheet containing a table with the source data.

step.cmd: Select the worksheet PivotTable and double-click on the results of Jansen in the region East.

stepresult.p: Excel creates a new worksheet with a list of all information about Jansen in the region East.
